chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Learning the concept of Inline and Block Elements in HTML is very important.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Inline elements are those which only take as much width as required.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And Block Elements are those which take the entire width of the screen.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: It is also called Display Property which can be set through CSS.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you are enjoying this video so far then do like this video.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So let's go to the computer screen and look closely at Inline and Block Elements.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Through some very good examples, let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So guys, it's time to look at Inline and Block Elements.

chunks.text: If you haven't accessed the playlist and haven't accessed the code then do both.

chunks.text: Because as the videos are being made, the code and video are being added in the playlist.

chunks.text: But I will add more details to it now.

chunks.text: What are the Inline elements and why I want to use them.

chunks.text: So look at Inline Elements. They are only the amount of width that is required.
